name: grilled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of food) cooked over fire or hot coals, usually on a metal frame: grilled shrimp
UK (US broiled) (of food) cooked under a very hot surface in a cooker: Do you want your fish pan-fried or grilled?
